Text:
Actually I picked it up at Barnes & Noble as an xmass gift for only $20.
With all the extra commentary and jokes he adds by the strips, its well worth the cost if you're a Dilbert fan. 
The strips themselves are great, but many are funnier once you read the backstory behind them ;P
Edit, read my comments on the Spirou book i already uploaded, the answer is already in there.
I have also replied with a few links on the Spirou torrent page.
